title: The Bachelorette: Angie Kent reveals her secret family tragedy before premiere
text:
Angie Kent has revealed her secret heartbreak as she prepares to debut as The Bachelorette.

The former Gogglebox star, 29, told TV Week that she believes her late grandmother helped 'set up' her role on the dating show.

Angie spent a lot of time with her grandparents growing up, as her father worked full time and her mother was often at the hospital visiting her brother Josh, who suffered from health problems as a child.

'She set this up for me': Angie Kent (pictured) has revealed the secret family tragedy that inspired her to find love on The Bachelorette

As a result, she shared a remarkably close bond with her grandmother, whom she affectionately referred to as Nanny Fae.

'So much has changed since [she died last year],' Angie said. 'I've been quite emotional this morning. I think she's done all of this.

'It's wild. As soon as she passed, everything fell into place. She's just with me.'

Fate: The former Gogglebox star, 29, told TV Week that she believes her late grandmother (pictured) helped 'set up' her role on the dating show

Angie explained that she believes Nanny Fae 'sent her into the jungle' (referring to her stint on I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! earlier this year) and also 'set up' The Bachelorette for her.

She concluded: 'You'll have to wait to see what she found me at the end.'

Angie's grandmother died last year, shortly after her grandfather passed away.

Loss: Angie's grandmother, whom she affectionately referred to as Nanny Fae, died last year

She spoke about her loss on I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here!, describing it as 'the most awful thing that ever happened to [her] family.'

Angie explained that she went to visit her grandmother one morning, but discovered she had already died.

'There was a nurse there in the morning getting her up, because of her hip, and she tried to revive her. I just screamed. I fell to the floor, it was awful,' she said.

Angie previously revealed that Nanny Fae's death was one of the reasons why she decided to quit Gogglebox and relocate from Sydney to the Sunshine Coast to be closer to her mother.

Angie's journey on The Bachelorette begins Wednesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
